title: Mechanical Keyboard Mods
description: Custom mechanical keyboard modifications including switch swapping, case modifications, and custom firmware implementations.
details:
Keyboard projects include:

  • GMMK Pro with lubed Gateron Black Ink switches
  • Custom QMK firmware with macro programming
  • Sound dampening modifications with foam and tape
  • Custom keycap sets and artisan keycaps
  • Bluetooth conversion for vintage keyboards

These keyboards serve as both daily drivers for programming and specialized input devices for specific workflows.
